title: Classic red velvet cake
ingredients: ['280g plain flour', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '110g butter, at room temperature', '250g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225ml buttermilk', '1 tablespoon red food colouring gel', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon vinegar']
